name: Pacific Rendezvous
overview:
Pacific Rendezvous is one of New Zealand’s most spectacularly situated holiday resort at Tutakaka, Northland only two and a half hours from Auckland. It sits on a peninsula that jets out into the deep blue Pacific water and offers a breath taking ocean panorama. This Pacific resort offers a variety of exciting experiences and activities, including; swimming, surfing, boating, scuba diving, sight-seeing and a variety of fishing trips.

Pacific Rendezvous guests can choose any of these activities, choose to adventure around the beautiful surrounding area or just take a load off and relax by the resort pool or spa. There is a marina, lush golf course and shopping areas locate nearby which Pacific Rendezvous provides transportation to and from. Pacific Rendezvous embodies 30 individually styled rooms, each complete with full kitchen facilities, unique views, conveniently located BBQ’s and are all only a short stroll away from a beautiful secluded beach.

Pacific Rendezvous is the perfect destination for smaller vacationing parties or for larger events as well, such as weddings. The friendly team at Pacific Rendezvous are knowledgeable about the area and are skilled in helping guests find exactly what they are looking for on their scenic holiday getaway.
